? CartoonCharacter

java.lang.Object
  CartoonCharacter

public class CartoonCharacter
extends java.lang.Object

A CartoonCharacter object is a cartoon character, displayed on the screen that can move around, change the direction the character is facing, change its emotion (smiling or frowning) speak or "think" a phrase

??????
CartoonCharacter(double x, double y, java.lang.String name)
          Constructor requires the coordinates (left, top) of where it should be placed, and the folder name where the images are, For example new CartoonCharacter(100, 50, "Jim"); There are three folders already made for you: "Jim", "Jan", and "Jon"
 
????
 void frown()
          makes the CartoonCharacter frown
 void lookLeft()
          makes the CartoonCharacter turn to the left
 void lookRight()
          makes the CartoonCharacter turn to the right
 void smile()
          makes the CartoonCharacter smile
 void speak(java.lang.String words)
          makes the CartoonCharacter say something in a speech box
 void think(java.lang.String words)
          makes the CartoonCharacter think something in a speech bubble
 void walk(double dist)
          makes the CartoonCharacter walk in the direction it is facing
